sense.def:
Na osebe ali stvari, ki so
reliable
, se lahko zanesemo, da bodo dobro delale ali se vedle tako, kot želimo od njih.

seg.quote: She is a charming and reliable person.
The diesel engine is long-lasting and extremely reliable.
They worked reliably under battle conditions.
These machines have always been noted for reliability.

sense.def:
Podatek, ki je
reliable
, je najverjetneje točen.

seg.quote: We are reliably informed that her new record will be released in the autumn.
